searchField.description: Select the field whose text anki-forvo-dl should use to search on Forvo for the note type {{noteType}}

backupSearchField.description: The field whose content will be used to search on Forvo when there are no results for the search field's content.

audioField.description: The field where the downloaded audio will be placed in.

language.description: The language of this deck that will be used to search on Forvo

skipExisting.description: Skip cards that already have content in their audio field
